comment: Smart Data models -DCAT-AP distribution of a Dataset, adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.DCAT-AP/master/DistributionDCAT-AP/schema.json
description: this is a distribution belonging ot a dataset according to the DCAT-AP standard 2.0.1

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: availability
contents.comment: This property indicates how long it is planned to keep the Distribution of the Dataset available.

contents.name: byteSize
contents.comment: This property contains the size of a Distribution in bytes.

contents.name: checksum
contents.comment: This property provides a mechanism that can be used to verify that the contents of a distribution have not changed. The checksum is related to the downloadURL.

contents.name: compressionFormat
contents.comment: This property refers to the format of the file in which the data is contained in a compressed form, e.g. to reduce the size of the downloadable file. It SHOULD be expressed using a media type as defined in the official register of media types managed by IANA

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: format
contents.comment: This property refers to the file format of the Distribution.

contents.name: hasPolicy
contents.comment: This property refers to the policy expressing the rights associated with the distribution if using the ODRL vocabulary

contents.name: license
contents.comment: This property refers to a data service that gives access to the distribution of the dataset

contents.name: mediaType
contents.comment: This property refers to the media type of the Distribution as defined in the official register of media types managed by IANA

contents.name: modifiedDate
contents.comment: This property contains the most recent date on which the Distribution was changed or modified.

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: packagingFormat
contents.comment: This property refers to the format of the file in which one or more data files are grouped together, e.g. to enable a set of related files to be downloaded together. It SHOULD be expressed using a media type as defined in the official register of media types managed by IANA

contents.name: releaseDate
contents.comment: This property contains the date of formal issuance (e.g., publication) of the Distribution.

contents.name: rights
contents.comment: This property refers to a statement that specifies rights associated with the Distribution.

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: accessService
contents.comment: This property refers to a data service that gives access to the distribution of the dataset

contents.name: accessUrl
contents.comment: This property contains a URL that gives access to a Distribution of the Dataset. The resource at the access URL may contain information about how to get the Dataset.

contents.name: documentation
contents.comment: This property refers to a page or document about this Distribution.

contents.name: downloadURL
contents.comment: This property contains a URL that is a directlink to a downloadable file in a givenformat.

contents.name: language
contents.comment: This property refers to a language used in the Distribution. This property can be repeated if the metadata is provided in multiple languages.

contents.name: linkedSchemas
contents.comment: This property refers to an established schema to which the described Distribution conforms.

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: spatialResolution
contents.comment: This property refers to the minimum spatial separation resolvable in a dataset distribution, measured in meters

contents.name: temporalResolution
contents.comment: This property refers to the minimum time period resolvable in the dataset distribution

contents.name: title
contents.comment: This property contains a name given to the Distribution. This property can be repeated for parallel language versions of the description.

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
